name: Triple Laser Death March
description:
ZAP! Fast-paced robot action - stay on your feet!

Bullets, missiles and lasers are everywhere and go everywhere in TRIPLE LASER DEATH MARCH. Dodge stuff and return fire with your own awesome arsenal - from trusty sidearms to nuke launchers and, indeed, triple laser mayhem.

You can buy as many crazy weapons as you like and build your arsenal, at a catch - buying cool guns reduces your max health, adding to the challenge.

Keep moving, return fire, and emerge victorious
